title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\CloudStorageOptions
name: CloudStorageOptions
description:
Options defining a file or a set of files within a Cloud Storage bucket.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.CloudStorageOptions

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.file_set
params.description: The set of one or more files to scan.

params.name: data.bytes_limit_per_file
params.description: Max number of bytes to scan from a file. If a scanned file's size is bigger than this value then the rest of the bytes are omitted. Only one of bytes_limit_per_file and bytes_limit_per_file_percent can be specified. Cannot be set if de-identification is requested.

params.name: data.bytes_limit_per_file_percent
params.description: Max percentage of bytes to scan from a file. The rest are omitted. The number of bytes scanned is rounded down. Must be between 0 and 100, inclusively. Both 0 and 100 means no limit. Defaults to 0. Only one of bytes_limit_per_file and bytes_limit_per_file_percent can be specified. Cannot be set if de-identification is requested.

params.name: data.file_types
params.description: List of file type groups to include in the scan. If empty, all files are scanned and available data format processors are applied. In addition, the binary content of the selected files is always scanned as well. Images are scanned only as binary if the specified region does not support image inspection and no file_types were specified. Image inspection is restricted to 'global', 'us', 'asia', and 'europe'.

params.name: data.files_limit_percent
params.description: Limits the number of files to scan to this percentage of the input FileSet. Number of files scanned is rounded down. Must be between 0 and 100, inclusively. Both 0 and 100 means no limit. Defaults to 0.

methods.description:

Cannot be set if de-identification is requested.

Cannot be set if de-identification is requested.

Cannot be set if de-identification is requested.

methods.name: getFileTypes
methods.description:
List of file type groups to include in the scan.

If empty, all files are scanned and available data format processors are applied. In addition, the binary content of the selected files is always scanned as well. Images are scanned only as binary if the specified region does not support image inspection and no file_types were specified. Image inspection is restricted to 'global', 'us', 'asia', and 'europe'.

Generated from protobuf field repeated .google.privacy.dlp.v2.FileType file_types = 5;
